com.threerings.getdown.launcher

Class Getdown

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.threerings.getdown.launcher.Getdown
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Application.StatusDisplay, ImageLoader, java.lang.Runnable

    public abstract class Getdown
extends java.lang.Thread
implements Application.StatusDisplay, ImageLoader
    Manages the main control for the Getdown application updater and deployment system.

      • loadImage

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage loadImage(java.lang.String path)
        Load the image at the path. Before trying the exact path/file specified we will look to see if we can find a localized version by sticking a _<language> in front of the "." in the filename.
